title: Chilled and then serious Ranked 5's team recruitment xD GIRLS ENCOURAGED to join :D
body:
Alrighty guys this is the second post for the team recruitment SO! looking for members who are chilled relaxed and like to have fun but eventually take more interests to actual tournaments and comps I shall provide further details in that area once you have applied. Alrighty I have currently a team A and a team B due to some legitimate real life problems a few members in team A has taken leave hence why this is the 2nd post. SO! reason why i encourage girls to join is because this is not a single smex game and we do already have girls in the team and they're hoping for more that share the same interest and we do hope that we shall go far in that regard and get each members name noticed regardless of your solo ranking :D . Anywho what I need first is of course your application so fill in below what i need you to answer :D

IGN:
Age:
Gender:
Role Preference:
Rank: 
Communication: ie skype, team speak etc

What made YOU take a look at this post and why YOU want to join this particular team with my awesome self in it :D :

HOORAH!!

replies.body:
IGN: Dwok

Age: 20

Roles: Support, Mid, Adc (in that order) 

Rank: Silver 1 (hopefully can get to gold before Season 5) 

Communications: I pretty much all of them so I don't care what you use

I'm pretty much just looking for some nice people to play with and help me get better. I'm pretty competitive so I'd be happy to join a serious ranked team but just playing with some fun people is always nice

IGN: Indy Savvy
Age: 18
Role Preference: All, but prefer ADC
Rank: Gold V

I took an interest to your team as I'm looking for a chilled group to play with to improve individual and team skills, while having fun in the process.
I have a mic and pretty much all VOIP's, I play regularly, have good communication, and would love to be on your team with your awesome self. Sorry, I'm not a girl :(

IGN: Knuuckles
Age: 19 (almost 20 D: )
Role Preference: mid/supp (main both)
Rank: silver 2
i'm a casual player of sorts and i really dislike ragers and complainers so something chill would be a nice change
In attempt to reform team siren you've stumbled across a bunch of men looking to get some. Congratulations!!!

IGN: Zerqq
Age: 14
Role Preference: Adc by far but can play jungle/supp pretty good as well
Rank: Gold II (100 lp)
I looked at this post because I wanted a pretty chilled team and this seems like it is haha and I want to join cause I like it :3
